item.description:
Join NHCer Eduardo at Ola's Restaurant in Orange for a Happy Hour followed by Free Salsa Demo's.  Eduardo will host this meetup and will follow up with any additional info and contact information.

Ola's is a Latin influence restaurant located on the Post Road in Orange, near TGIFridays.  They have recieved several good reviews in the papers, check out the links on thier web page here.  (There is also a menu available on that site, though the main page seems to be down at the moment.)

The Salsa Instructor is Freddy Ramirez, whom has won several state and local competitions.

Happy Hour is from 6-8, the Salsa Demos run from 8 on.

Happy Hour specials are as follows: Beer and Tall Glass House Margaritas &5.00and Red and White Sangria $6.00.

PARKING: Please park in back of building adjacent to TGIFriday's lot...
item.how_to_find_us: Call or Look for Eduardo, he will post additional contact information in his RSVP.
item.name: "Ola's" Happy Hour and Salsa Lessons
